abstract: George Vecsey Sports of The Times column on Detroit, city that has moved into the spotlight with the success of the Detroit Lions and Detroit Tigers; maintains that whether any of that makes any real difference in the economic prospects of the city is open for debate, but feeling good never hurts.
snippet: The recent achievements of the Lions and Tigers add to the glimmers of optimism for long-downtrodden Detroit.
lead_paragraph: The recent achievements of the Lions and Tigers add to the glimmers of optimism for long-downtrodden Detroit.

headline.main: In the Motor City, Success on the Field and Hope Off It
headline.print_headline: In the Motor City, Success on the Field and Hope Off It
headline.seo: In Detroit, Lions and Tigers Add to Hopes for City
